translation.registrationSubtitle: By signing up you will have the opportunity to save your favorite content and to stay updated on all the initiatives of the museum
translation.privacyLabel3: and I consent to the processing of my personal data pursuant to art. 13 of D. Lgs. 196/2003
translation.tutorial_e1: Follow this short tutorial to get the most out of the app.
translation.tutorial_e2: You can pick one of the six different tours.
translation.tutorial_e3: Click on the number of the case you want to visit.
translation.tutorial_e4: You can read the Easy Reading description corresponding to the point of interest.
translation.tutorial_e5: You can listen to the audio guide corresponding to the point of interest.
translation.tutorial_e7: You can change the display settings.
translation.tutorial_e9: You can always return to the tutorial for navigation clarifications.
